title: Headbandz

sections.heading: HOW TO PLAY
sections.body:
• Record "yes" on one switch and "no" on the other
• The switch user has to work with you to help you guess what image you have on your card by answering your yes/no questions with their switches
• The more more answers the switch user helps you to guess the more points!
• You could also play this game in two teams to create competition

tooltipText: Use 2 switches to answer yes/no questions in a game of HeadBandz
